product_name: Banana Boat Sport Performance UltraMist Spray Sunscreen - SPF 50
long_description: Banana Boat Sport Performance(TM) UltraMist(R) continuous spray sunscreen provides long-lasting SPF 50 protection while you hike, bike and surf. AvoTriplex(TM) technology protects against sunburn with high UVB protection and protects against the effects of aging and skin damage with high UVA protection. 1-touch continuous spray allows for quick and easy coverage. Nongreasy formula dries quickly and does not require rubbing in; formula is very water and sweat resistant. Won't run into eyes. Apply generously and evenly 15 min. before sun exposure; reapply frequently and after swimming or towel drying. Twist-and-lock top prevents accidental spraying.
short_description: Banana Boat Sport Performance(TM) UltraMist(R) continuous spray sunscreen provides long-lasting SPF 50 protection while you hike, bike and surf.
